modName: Female Nord with proper voice follower Adamine
summary: Female nord follower with proper voice
descriptionHtml:
[color=red ][center][size=8]WARNING[/size][/center][/color]

This followers contains the original female Nord voice pack.

In order to make it work properly you need to download firstly this mod 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36913/ ]MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage[/url]

[color=pink]About the follower[/color]

The follower as shown in the pics above is called Adamine and she can be found in 

the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun . (see pics )

She is equiped with ancient nord armor with a ancient nord sword a steel shield  along with ancient nord bow 

She is 1 handed heavy armor type and very good archer top level she reaches is 60 (see pics)

[color=green]Mods that are shown above are[/color]


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34213/?]CNHF 1_0 Calyps and Nuskas Heroic Form BODY REPLACER by calyps ja nuska[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037//?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36913/ ]MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage[/url]

[color=red]Problems[/color]

Sometimes the proper dialogue wont appear to follow, in that case you open the command list with (~)

And type these commands with this order

1. addfac 5C84D 1

2. Setrelationshiprank "NPC ID HERE" 4

3. Player.setrelationshiprank "NPC ID HERE" 4

[color=yellow]Credits[/color] 

This follower (and the next to come ) are only working thanks to the awesome Mysticentity 

and her mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36913/ ]MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage[/url]

Hope you enjoy it any suggestions are welcome :D
author: Garuger
